languages.text: "Гемункул представляет угрозу для обоих наших видов, элантах. Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно его черное сердце и извращенный разум. Тервантьяс должен быть уничтожен, и мои собратья приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "Гемункул представляет угрозу для обоих наших видов, элантах. Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно его черное сердце и извращенный разум. Тревентьяс должен быть уничтожен, и мои собратья приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."
languages.original_text: "Гемункул представляет угрозу для обоих наших видов, элантах. Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно его черное сердце и извращенный разум. Тервантьяс должен быть уничтожен, и мои собратья приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "The haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark hart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kinsmen took on the role of the vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «El hemónculo es una amenaza para nuestras dos especies, elantach. Sabes bien de qué son capaces su oscuro corazón y su mente perversa. Tervantias debe ser destruido, y mis congéneres han asumido el papel de la espada vengadora».
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: «El hemónculo es una amenaza para nuestras dos especies, elantach. Sabes bien de qué son capaces su oscuro corazón y su mente perversa. Tervantias debe ser destruido, y mis congéneres han asumido el papel de la espada vengadora».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “血伶人对我们两个种族都是威胁，外界人。你很清楚，血伶人阴暗的内心与邪恶的思想能做出多么可怕的事情。我们必须消灭特万提亚斯，而我的族人会承担起复仇之刃的角色。”
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: “血伶人对我们两个种族都是威胁，外界人。你很清楚，血伶人阴暗的内心与邪恶的思想能做出多么可怕的事情。我们必须消灭特万提亚斯，而我的族人会承担起复仇之刃的角色。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « L'hémoncule est une menace pour nos deux espèces, elantach ; vous savez aussi bien que moi de quoi son cœur noir et son esprit pervers sont capables. Il faut éliminer Tervantias, et les miens ont endossé le rôle de la lame vengeresse qui le pourfendra. »
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: « L'hémoncule est une menace pour nos deux espèces, elantach ; vous savez aussi bien que moi de quoi son cœur noir et son esprit pervers sont capables. Il faut éliminer Tervantias, et les miens ont assumé le rôle de la lame vengeresse qui le pourfendra. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ハモンキュラスは我々の種族にとって脅威だ、エランタ。その暗い心と倒錯した精神が何をしでかすか、あなたなら知っているはずだ。テルヴァンティアスを滅ぼさなければならない。そして、我が血族が復讐の刃の役割を引き受けたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: 「ハモンキュラスは我々の種族にとって脅威だ、エランタ。その暗い心と倒錯した精神が何をしでかすか、あなたなら知っているはずだ。テルヴァンティアスを滅ぼさなければならない。そして、我が血族が復讐の刃の役割を引き受けたのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Der Haemonculus ist eine Gefahr für unser beider Spezies, Elantach. Ihr wisst genau, wozu sein dunkles Herz und sein pervertierter Verstand fähig sind. Tervantias muss vernichtet werden, und meine Verwandten haben die Rolle der rachsüchtigen Klinge übernommen."
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: "Der Haemonculus ist eine Gefahr für unser beider Spezies, Elantach. Ihr wisst genau, wozu sein dunkles Herz und sein pervertierter Verstand fähig sind. Tervantias muss vernichtet werden, und meine Verwandten haben die Rolle der rachsüchtigen Klinge übernommen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Haimonkulus, ikimizin halkı için de tehdit teşkil ediyor elantach. Onun karanlık kalbinin ve sapkın zihninin neler yapabileceğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Tervantias'ın yok edilmesi ve intikam kılıcı rolünü de soydaşlarımın üstlenmesi gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species, elantach. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: "Haimonkulus, ikimizin halkı için de tehdit teşkil ediyor elantach. Onun karanlık kalbinin ve sapkın zihninin neler yapabileceğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Tervantias'ın yok edilmesi ve intikam kılıcı rolünü de soydaşlarımın üstlenmesi gerekiyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
